Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'human aging' targeting readability level Early Elementary. Limit the output to 150 words. In simple terms, aging is when our bodies change as we grow older. This happens to everyone, slowly over time. Our skin might wrinkle, and we may not move as quickly or see as clearly as before. Our hair might turn gray or fall out. Inside our bodies, cells can stop working as well, making us feel tired or sick more easily. But aging also brings good things! We learn more, gain wisdom, and have many wonderful experiences. We can enjoy these special moments with our families and friends.

Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'human aging' targeting readability level Early Elementary. Limit the output to 150 words. As we grow older, our bodies change.
